description: The child-like operative in charge of Operation "Silver Wild Grapevine". She had been studying Aika and had learned how Aika fights. Aika was tricked into a pilot adaptability physical examination, whereby Rie gathers physical data on Aika. After her connections to the Delmos were revealed, rather than escaping, Rie proceeded to continue gathering Aika`s battle data by sending her underlings against her and then taping the entire battle.
name: Rie Petoriyacowa
